mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workout_session (user_id, title, start_time, total_volume) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{startTime}, #{totalVolume})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workout_session WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND end_time IS NULL ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(s.weight * s.reps) FROM workout_set s JOIN workout_activity a ON s.activity_id = a.id WHERE a.session_id = #{sessionId}

SELECT recordDate, squat, bench, deadlift, (squat + bench + deadlift) as total FROM ( SELECT DATE(s.start_time) as recordDate, MAX(CASE WHEN e.name = 'Squat' OR e.id = 1 THEN ws.weight ELSE 0 END) as squat, MAX(CASE WHEN e.name = 'Bench Press' OR e.id = 3 THEN ws.weight ELSE 0 END) as bench, MAX(CASE WHEN e.name = 'Deadlift' OR e.id = 5 THEN ws.weight ELSE 0 END) as deadlift FROM workout_session s JOIN workout_activity wa ON s.id = wa.session_id JOIN exercise e ON wa.exercise_id = e.id JOIN workout_set ws ON wa.id = ws.activity_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.end_time IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE(s.start_time) ) t WHERE squat > 0 OR bench > 0 OR deadlift > 0 ORDER BY recordDate ASC
